scripts.postinstall: cp -n src/env/local.template.ts src/env/local.ts && cp -n src/env/local.ts src/env/env.ts
scripts.build:local: npm run build:raise:local && npm run build:mwa:local
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:raise:dev && npm run build:mwa:dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:raise:prod && npm run build:mwa:prod
scripts.build:raise:local: cp src/env/local.ts src/env/env.ts && npm run type-check && PREFIX_PATHS=true gatsby build && rm -rf public-raise && mv public public-raise
scripts.build:raise:dev: cp src/env/dev.ts src/env/env.ts && npm run type-check && PREFIX_PATHS=true gatsby build && rm -rf public-raise && mv public public-raise
scripts.build:raise:prod: cp src/env/prod.ts src/env/env.ts && npm run type-check && PREFIX_PATHS=true gatsby build && rm -rf public-raise && mv public public-raise
scripts.build:mwa:local: cp src/env/local.ts src/env/env.ts && rm -rf ../web-mwa && mkdir ../web-mwa && cp -r * ../web-mwa && cd ../web-mwa && mv src/pages src/pages-all && mv src/pages-all/cambridge src/pages && rm -rf src/pages-all && sed -i 's|from "../|from "|g' src/pages/*.tsx && sed -i 's/CUSTOM_RAISE_DOMAIN/CUSTOM_MWA_DOMAIN/g' gatsby-config.js && npm run type-check && PREFIX_PATHS=true gatsby build && rm -rf ../web/public-mwa && mv public ../web/public-mwa && cd .. && rm -rf web-mwa
scripts.build:mwa:dev: cp src/env/dev.ts src/env/env.ts && rm -rf ../web-mwa && mkdir ../web-mwa && cp -r * ../web-mwa && cd ../web-mwa && mv src/pages src/pages-all && mv src/pages-all/cambridge src/pages && rm -rf src/pages-all && sed -i 's|from "../|from "|g' src/pages/*.tsx && sed -i 's/CUSTOM_RAISE_DOMAIN/CUSTOM_MWA_DOMAIN/g' gatsby-config.js && npm run type-check && PREFIX_PATHS=true gatsby build && rm -rf ../web/public-mwa && mv public ../web/public-mwa && cd .. && rm -rf web-mwa
scripts.build:mwa:prod: cp src/env/prod.ts src/env/env.ts && rm -rf ../web-mwa && mkdir ../web-mwa && cp -r * ../web-mwa && cd ../web-mwa && mv src/pages src/pages-all && mv src/pages-all/cambridge src/pages && rm -rf src/pages-all && sed -i 's|from "../|from "|g' src/pages/*.tsx && sed -i 's/CUSTOM_RAISE_DOMAIN/CUSTOM_MWA_DOMAIN/g' gatsby-config.js && npm run type-check && PREFIX_PATHS=true gatsby build && rm -rf ../web/public-mwa && mv public ../web/public-mwa && cd .. && rm -rf web-mwa
